content.rendered: Is your business, company, or organization interested in impacting Cobb County youth? Then sign up to sponsor a “Career Night” at our Pathways to Success youth development program this semester! You’ll have the opportunity to provide a meal for our program participants, share about your field/business and career, and then do a short Q&A with teens looking to change their trajectory in life. For more info, please reach out to Renee McCormick at:  renee.mccormick@fourcornersgroup.net
